name: THE OPP Project
description:
I know...The name isn't very enticing but it will be ok ;)

Unity Object Oriented Programming Project (Submission for Unity Junior Programmer Lessons)

Play with your mouse and your keyboard

  • Aim with your mouse
  • Shoot with [LeftClick]
  • Move with [A] & [D]
  • Dodge with [Space]

Made by

  • Dournaux Nathan
